🔍 ABOUT ELEVEN LAB

ELEVEN LAB is an innovative tech school shaping the future with AI and coding.

🎓 Founder & Director | ELEVEN LAB

I am Sai Sai, the Founder and Director of ELEVEN LAB, a leading institution specializing in IT, AI, and Coding education. At ELEVEN LAB, we provide high-quality online and onsite courses, ensuring flexible learning for students of all levels. My goal is to equip learners with future-ready tech skills and empower them to excel in the digital world. I look forward to collaborating with you!.

Founded in 2025, ELEVEN LAB provides year-round tech education.
